Refinements.Name: Lingering Cries
Descriptions: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the equipper gains a buff that increases Anomaly Proficiency by <color=#2BAD00>30</color>, stacking up to 4 times. This effect expires when the target recovers from Stun or is defeated. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

This effect expires when the target recovers from Stun or is defeated. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
